attributes.action: extra training for teachers who teach children on the autism spectrum in mainstream schools
attributes.additional_details:
I think all teachers, that teach children in mainstream schools need to have a better understanding, and training, educating children who are on the Autism spectrum.

I believe, it would make a massive difference to the relationship between teachers, and special needs children, if teachers, had that further help and insight, into what they are dealing with, and how best to help them. I would love to see this become compulsory.
